name: Discretionary Supplement
title: "Discretionary Supplement" Dori
desc: "First raise the price by 30%, then sell at a 20% discount!"
inPlayDescription: The Jinni summoned by your Dori who has this card equipped heals 1 more HP when healing characters with no more than 6 HP, and increases the amount of Energy gained by characters with no Energy by 1 when Energy is gained.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Dori to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Dori, equip this card.
After Dori equips this card, immediately use Alcazarzaray's Exactitude once.
The Jinni summoned by your Dori who has this card equipped heals 1 more HP when healing characters with no more than 6 HP, and increases the amount of Energy gained by characters with no Energy by 1 when Energy is gained.
(You must have Dori in your deck to add this card to your deck)
